channel.title: Need help!
channel.description:
Well, I have been hosting a silabsoft server recently and its going pretty well, but I can't make my server 24/7 since my restarter won't work
What my problem is is that the only way my server can be online is if I launch server from my compiler, and my runserver.bat and copy of runserver.bat states server is online, but nobody can join! My goal is for the restarter to launch with the compiler but I have no Idea how to get that to work, if anyone has had this problem or just knows how to help, please reply! ;)

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

This is the RSC section. I am sure if you post in the RS2 section, you’ll get the help needed.

Read full topic
